metadata.description:
Dearly Beloved is a love song at the core. It sparked from a conversation with my girl about our lives and careers. In music and film, things can be sporadic. You never know where a job will take you where and when you find joy in the presence of another, the distance affects you. I wanted to write her/myself like an audio letter so that if we ever miss each other we could play it and have those mushy memories. 

I produced this track also playin guitar and bass. I recorded it punch-in style, which basically how iâ€™ve done everything for the past year and 2 months.
metadata.name: dearly beloved #1
metadata.title: dearly beloved
